jobPostingInfo.title: Year-Round Business Intern
jobPostingInfo.jobDescription:
Job Details

New ideas are all around us, but only a few will change the world. That’s our focus at JPL. We ask the biggest questions, then search the universe for answers—literally. We build upon ideas that have guided generations, then share our discoveries to inspire generations to come. Your mission—your opportunity—is to seek out the answers that bring us one step closer. If you’re driven to discover, create, and inspire something that lasts a lifetime and beyond, you’re ready for JPL.

Located in Pasadena, California, JPL has a campus-like environment situated on 177 acres in the foothills of the San Gabriel Mountains and offers a work environment unlike any other: we inspire passion, foster innovation, build collaboration, and reward excellence.

The JPL Acquisition Division has an exciting business part-time internship opportunity for an undergraduate studying Business Administration, or a related major, in our Engineering Subcontracts Section. This intern will have the opportunity to gain hands-on work experience in the application of subcontracts within Financial and Business Operations, which includes issuing and managing active noncomplex and moderately complex subcontracts.  ​

  • Provide overall subcontract support, such as assistance with past performance questionnaires, Subcontracts Metrics and Reporting Tool (SMART) data entry, Source Evaluation Teams (SETs), and Oracle data reports
  • Work on subcontract modifications, such as no cost extensions and incremental funding
  • Provide support to subcontracts managers in developing and issuing solicitations
  • Prepare documentation appropriate to the value of the subcontracts to satisfy internal audit and review requirements
  • Responsible for communication necessary to convey significant activities associated with the issuance of low dollar subcontracts internally and externally
  • Perform standard transactions on the financial business process/systems based on departmental instructions
  • Understand and apply applicable policies, procedures and practices to determine work methods and deliver results
  • Close-out of inactive subcontracts and agreements
  • Participate on a team within own organization


Qualifications:

  • Must live close to JPL. This is a hybrid internship.
  • Must be currently enrolled at least half-time at an accredited local college or university pursuing a Bachelors degree in Business or related discipline
  • Must be able to work a minimum of 20 hours per week, with a maximum of 30 hours per week while in school
  • Ability to work full-time during the Summer
  • Strong written and verbal communication skills and ability to work in a team environment
  • Minimum GPA 3.0
  • Completed coursework with exposure to standard principles, theories, concepts and techniques in business communications and database spreadsheets
  • Prior internship experience in related business areas
  • Ability to rapidly comprehend and apply subcontracting principles in high-volume environment
  • Participation in student organizations
  • Intermediate to advanced knowledge of MS Excel, Word and PowerPoint
  • Ability to interface with all levels of personnel and the ability to resolve multifaceted issues
  • Punctual, details oriented, resourceful and a self-motivated individual

The typical hourly rate for this job in Pasadena, California depending on education level is $16.11 as a freshman, $19 as a sophomore, $22 as a junior, $25 as a senior

JPL has a catalog of benefits and perks that span from the traditional to the unique. This includes a variety of health, dental, vision, wellbeing, and retirement plans, paid time off, learning, rideshare, childcare, flexible schedule, parental leave and many more. Our focus is on work-life balance, and living healthy, fulfilling lives as we Dare Mighty Things Together. For benefits eligible positions, benefits are effective the first day of the month coincident with or immediately following the employee’s start date.

For further benefits information click Benefits and Perks
